prompt: Create an image upload page with a professional light theme and a card-based layout. The upload zone should be a card with a subtle shadow, light gray border (#E0E0E0), and a centered cloud icon with text 'Click to Add Images' and format info (PNG, JPG, max 6MB). Use a blue accent color (#1976D2) for buttons and icons. Place the upload button inside the upload zone at the bottom. Display selected files in a list below with cards containing file names, sizes, and a remove button. Use a white background with clean typography and Material Design spacing.
